post.author: slush_puppy
post.body:
Hello Everyone

Well I was not sure where to put this but this might be the place. I am not really working on a mod yet but I was wondering if anyone would be interested in working on THE ROOM(S)? The basic idea is to make random rooms in doom 3 then from there we populate it with all kinds of static meshes and stuff.
I am new to 3D modelling but I have done some basic models. Now the idea would be to make a map and then someone sends a static mesh or mapobject that he wants anyone to use in a doom3 mod. The someone downloads THE ROOM and has the model and can run through the level looking at other models and use them in his mod if he wants.
Now I am talking any model. A coffee cup, cola can, car tyre or anything. But I am looking for finished models,fully textured,bumped,spec and high detail(Higher poly dan doom3). I have already begun with a few small models myself so I will hopefully have something to show soon.

This idea is open for anything.
TEXTURES
SOUNDS
MODELS
SCRIPTING
ANYTHING

But it has to be your own creation and you have to be willing to let someone use it in their mods.

Ok let me know what you guys think?
